knownFor: Spain's premier archaeological museum featuring treasures from prehistory to the 19th century, including the famous Lady of Elche and stunning Roman mosaics. Recently renovated with world-class exhibits.
ticketInfo: Free Mon-Sat 7-9pm, Sun 12:30-2pm (long queues, not recommended). Regular admission available. Free for under 25s.
